title: Resurgence of Refined Topological Strings and Dual Partition Functions
abstract: arXiv:2311.17638v2 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: We study the resurgent structure of the refined topological string partition function on a non-compact Calabi-Yau threefold, at large orders in the string coupling constant $g_s$ and fixed refinement parameter $\mathsf{b}$. For $\mathsf{b}\neq 1$, the Borel transform admits two families of simple poles, corresponding to integral periods rescaled by $\mathsf{b}$ and $1/\mathsf{b}$. We show that the corresponding Stokes automorphism is expressed in terms of a generalization of the non-compact quantum dilogarithm, and we conjecture that the Stokes constants are determined by the refined Donaldson-Thomas invariants counting spin-$j$ BPS states. This jump in the refined topological string partition function is a special case (unit five-brane charge) of a more general transformation property of wave functions on quantum twisted tori introduced in earlier work by two of the authors. We show that this property follows from the transformation

Title: Resurgence of Refined Topological Strings and Dual Partition Functions
Abstract: arXiv:2311.17638v2 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: We study the resurgent structure of the refined topological string partition function on a non-compact Calabi-Yau threefold, at large orders in the string coupling constant $g_s$ and fixed refinement parameter $\mathsf{b}$. For $\mathsf{b}\neq 1$, the Borel transform admits two families of simple poles, corresponding to integral periods rescaled by $\mathsf{b}$ and $1/\mathsf{b}$. We show that the corresponding Stokes automorphism is expressed in terms of a generalization of the non-compact quantum dilogarithm, and we conjecture that the Stokes constants are determined by the refined Donaldson-Thomas invariants counting spin-$j$ BPS states. This jump in the refined topological string partition function is a special case (unit five-brane charge) of a more general transformation property of wave functions on quantum twisted tori introduced in earlier work by two of the authors. We show that this property follows from the transformation
tldr: 该文章研究了修正拓扑弦 partition function 在高度耦合的 string 耦合常数 $g_s$ 下的 resurgence 结构，以及在固定修正参数 $\mathsf{b}$ 下的大数情况。文章发现，对于 $\mathsf{b}\neq 1$ 的情况，Borel 变换存在两组简单的极点，对应于依照 $\mathsf{b}$ 和 $1/\mathsf{b}$ 调整的本征周期。文章还展示了相应的 Stokes 自同构可以通过非压缩的量子双对数的一般化表达。此外，文章推测 Stokes 常数是由修正的 Donaldson-Thomas 不变量所确定的，这些不变量衡量了不同自旋 $j$ 的 BPS 态数。这种修正拓扑弦 partition 功能的跃变是两个作者以前工作中的一个更一般性波函数变换性质的特殊情况，该性质出现在量子扭结肿块上。文章还显示了这一性质可以从弦子的变换性质推导得到。
